net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute

Interface AttributeWriteMaximized

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadMaximized
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UiWidgetAbstractDialogWindow, UiWidgetAdapterAbstractDialogWindow, UiWidgetAdapterPopup, UiWidgetAdapterWindow, UiWidgetMediaVideo, UiWidgetPopup, UiWidgetWindow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetAbstractDialogWindow, AbstractUiWidgetPopup, AbstractUiWidgetWindow, FeatureBehaviorInsertImage.InserImagePopup, FeatureBehaviorInsertLink.InserImageLink, PopupWindow, RichTextToolbar.FontSettingsPopup, UiWidgetAdapterGwtAbstractDialogWindow, UiWidgetAdapterGwtPopup, UiWidgetAdapterGwtWindow, UiWidgetAdapterTestCompositeRegular, UiWidgetCustomAbstractDialogWindow, UiWidgetCustomPopup, UiWidgetPopupGwt, UiWidgetPopupTestImpl, UiWidgetWindowGwt

    public interface AttributeWriteMaximized
extends AttributeReadMaximized
    This interface gives read and write access to the maximized attribute of an object (e.g. window).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setMaximized(boolean maximized)
      This method (un)maximizes the object.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadMaximized

        isMaximized

    • Method Detail

      • setMaximized

        void setMaximized(boolean maximized)
        This method (un)maximizes the object. If it is un-maximized, its size and position will be restored to the values before it was maximized.
        Parameters:
        maximized - - true to maximize, false to un-maximize.
        See Also:
        AttributeReadMaximized.isMaximized()
